title: Implement allow-popups-to-escape-sandbox token for iframe sandbox attribute
body: Implement the token allow-popups-to-escape-sandbox for the iframe's sandbox attribute, as described here: https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/embedded-content.html#attr-iframe-sandbox. It has use cases for things like maps and advertising publishing.

comments.body: Any updates? which version has/doesn't have this token support? And for versions without the token support, does it still cause Sandbox propagation by default?

Another related feature request:
https://wpdev.uservoice.com/forums/257854-microsoft-edge-developer/suggestions/33758962-add-feature-detection-for-iframe-sandbox-tokens

Glad to know this is being worked on. There is another quite related sandbox feature:
https://wpdev.uservoice.com/forums/257854-microsoft-edge-developer/suggestions/19349266-add-a-new-flag-allow-top-navigation-with-gesture. Could it be prioritized too? Thanks.
